name: Car Dash
description: Control a car dodging AI vehicles coming from the opposite direction. Survive as long as possible in this intense, high-speed escape!

systemXHR.description: Req by SSO, This permission is require to call web api

device-storage:sdcard.description: Req by SSO readwrite readwrite access
device-storage:sdcard.name: device-storage:sdcard

browser.description: Required for embedding a browser iframe

volumemanager.description: Required for volume control using native method

audio-capture.description: Required to capture audio using getUserMedia()
